EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Video email-T001ZR.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Expand your business horizons without hiring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Did you know you can expand your business horizons without hiring … with Nokia?
As our valued partner, you’ll be assigned expert field marketing and sales experts who can work with you to help expand your business opportunities. Take advantage of our webinars, briefings and conferences to help you position Nokia products and solutions with your customers.
Contact Nokia <[[mailto:nokia_global_partner_communications@nokia.com?subject=I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20Nokia%20Support%20video%20for%20partners]]> to schedule a consultative meeting where, together, we can explore how to best help you achieve your business goals. Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
